text: Then I turned to look, and there was a flying scroll!

Someone <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> me, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> do <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st>?” I <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> a <st data-num="05774" class="">flying</st> <st data-num="04039" class="">scroll</st> <st data-num="06242 0520">30 feet</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="06235 0520">15 feet</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.”<n id="1" />

The speaker <st data-num="0559 0413">went on to say</st>, “<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is a <st data-num="0423" class="">curse</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318" class="">traveling</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">across</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">For example</st>, <st data-num="02088 03644">according to the curse</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="01589" class="">steals</st><n id="2" /> will be <st data-num="05352" class="">removed</st> from the community; or on the other hand (<st data-num="02088 03644">according to the curse</st>) <st data-num="03605" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="07650" class="">swears falsely</st> will <st data-num="05352" class="">suffer the same fate</st>.”

“I will send it out,” says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, “and it will enter the house of the thief and of the person who swears falsely in my name. It will land in the middle of his house and destroy both timber and stones.”
After this the angelic messenger who had been speaking to me went out and said, “Look, see what is leaving.”

I <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st>?” And he <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="02063" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="0374" class="">basket for measuring grain</st><n id="1" /> that is <st data-num="03318">moving away</st> from here.” Moreover, he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is their ‘<st data-num="05869" class="">eye</st>’<n id="2" /> throughout <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.”

<st data-num="02009" class="">Then</st> a <st data-num="03603" class="">round</st> <st data-num="05777" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="03603" class="">cover</st> was <st data-num="05375" class="">raised up</st>, revealing <st data-num="02063 0259">a</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">inside</st> the <st data-num="0374" class="">basket</st>.

He then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02063" class="">This woman</st> represents <st data-num="07564" class="">wickedness</st>,” and he <st data-num="07993" class="">pushed</st> her <st data-num="0413" class="">down</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0374" class="">basket</st> and <st data-num="07993" class="">placed</st> the <st data-num="05777" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="068" class="">cover</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">top</st>.

Then I <st data-num="05375 05869 07200">looked again</st> and <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318" class="">going forth</st> with the <st data-num="07307" class="">wind</st> in their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> (<st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> like <st data-num="03671" class="">those</st> of a <st data-num="02624" class="">stork</st>), and they <st data-num="05375" class="">lifted up</st> the <st data-num="0374" class="">basket</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st>.

I <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> the <st data-num="04397" class="">messenger</st> who was <st data-num="01696" class="">speaking</st> to me, “<st data-num="0575" class="">Where</st> are <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">taking</st> the <st data-num="0374" class="">basket</st>?”
He replied, “To build a temple for her in the land of Babylonia. When it is finished, she will be placed there in her own residence.”
